statements.update: update ASET_HAPUSSK set TGLSKHAPUS=#Tglskhapus#, KET=#Ket# where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NOSKHAPUS=#Noskhapus#
update ASET_HAPUSSK set tglvalid = #Tglskhapus# where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NOSKHAPUS=#Noskhapus#
update ASET_HAPUSSK set TGLVALID = NULL where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NOSKHAPUS=#Noskhapus#
statements.select: select AH.ID, AH.UNITKEY, D.KDUNIT, D.NMUNIT, AH.NOSKHAPUS, AH.TGLSKHAPUS, AH.KET, AH.TGLVALID from ASET_HAPUSSK AH left join DAFTUNIT D ON d.UNITKEY = ah.UNITKEY
where 1=1 and AH.UNITKEY = #Unitkey# and year(AH.TGLSKHAPUS) = (select CONFIGVAL from PEMDA where CONFIGID = 'cur_thang')
select COUNT(*) JMLDATA from ASET_HAPUSSKDET A where A.UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and A.NOSKHAPUS=#Noskhapus#

select sum(x.NOSKHAPUS) as JMLKIB from ( select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOSKHAPUS from ASET_KIBADET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Noskhapus# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOSKHAPUS from ASET_KIBBDET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Noskhapus# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOSKHAPUS from ASET_KIBCDET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Noskhapus# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOSKHAPUS from ASET_KIBDDET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Noskhapus# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOSKHAPUS from ASET_KIBEDET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Noskhapus# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOSKHAPUS from ASET_KIBGDET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Noskhapus#) x
